name: Release the bus
description:
Playing this game, you will be the Brave Driver of a booby-trapped bus on a highway full of danger.

Help the brave SWAT get the bombs out of the bus and free you from the trouble!

Helicopter with SWAT arrives EVERY 10 SECONDS

Don't miss your opportunity

CONTROLS:

A - Left turn

D - Right turn

R - Restart

Esc - Pause
